title: Big Movie Stars Miss Out on Bafta Awards List
summary: Some famous movie stars like George Clooney, Dwayne Johnson, and Julia Roberts did not make the longlist for the Bafta Film Awards this year. The Baftas are important because they often show who might win at the Oscars, which are big awards too. The longlists have been released, and a movie called One Battle After Another has the most mentions. The final nominations will be announced soon. These stars are still nominated for Golden Globes, another award show. In the past, many actors who won Baftas also won Oscars, so missing the Bafta list might mean they have less chance at the Oscars. Other actors like Adam Sandler made the longlist, and a movie called KPop Demon Hunters cannot be in the Baftas because it was on Netflix first.

background_read: The Bafta Film Awards are given every year in the UK to honor the best movies and actors. They are like the Oscars but in Britain. Many people watch these awards because they can predict who might win at the Oscars, which are even bigger awards in Hollywood. Actors work hard to get nominated, and being on the longlist is the first step. Sometimes, movies or actors miss out for different reasons, like if a movie was on streaming services first. This article talks about some famous stars who did not make the list this year and what that might mean for their chances at other awards.
